    Beta 3.

      Modifier and Type Class and Description

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static long DEFAULT_FREQUENCY
      The default update frequency (every 10 seconds / every 10000 milliseconds).
      java.lang.Object LOCK
      Object used for synchronization between the maps activity and the update thread.
      java.lang.Thread runner
      Thread that periodically fetches new buses from the RouteMatch server.

      The current state of the Update Thread.

    • Field Detail

      • state

        public UpdateThread.STATE state
        The current state of the Update Thread. Default state is stopped.

      • DEFAULT_FREQUENCY

        public static final long DEFAULT_FREQUENCY
        The default update frequency (every 10 seconds / every 10000 milliseconds).

        Constant Field Values

        Object used for synchronization between the maps activity and the update thread.

        Thread that periodically fetches new buses from the RouteMatch server.

    • Constructor Detail

      • UpdateThread

        public UpdateThread(android.os.Handler handler)
        Lazy constructor for the UpdateThread.
        Parameters:
        handler - Handler used to update buses on the UI Thread.

      • UpdateThread

        public UpdateThread(android.os.Handler handler,
                    long updateFrequency)
        Constructor for the UpdateThread.
        Parameters:
        handler - Handler used to update buses on the UI Thread.
        updateFrequency - How frequently (in milliseconds) the thread should loop. If this is omitted, it will default to 4000 milliseconds (4 seconds).

    • Method Detail

        Stops the update thread.

        Gets whether or not the thread is currently locked forever (waiting without timeout).
        Returns:
        If the thread is locked forever (waiting without timeout).
